verses.verse: There <S%H1961>was<s%> also a <S%H1486>lot<s%> for the <S%H4294>tribe<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh;<s%> <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> was the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph;<s%> to wit, for <S%H4353>Machir<s%> the <S%H1060>firstborn<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> the <S%H1>father<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead:<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> <S%H1931>he<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> of <S%H4421>war,<s%> therefore he <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan.<s%>

There <S%H1961>was<s%> also a lot for the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> by their <S%H4940>families;<s%> for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H44>Abiezer,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2507>Helek,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H844>Asriel,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H7928>Shechem,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> and for the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H8061>Shemida:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> were the <S%H2145>male<s%> <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> by their <S%H4940>families.<s%>

But <S%H6765>Zelophehad,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H2660>Hepher,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4353>Machir,<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H1121>sons,<s%> <S%H3588>but<s%> <S%H518><s%> <S%H1323>daughters:<s%> and <S%H428>these<s%> are the <S%H8034>names<s%> of his <S%H1323>daughters,<s%> <S%H4244>Mahlah,<s%> and <S%H5270>Noah,<s%> <S%H2295>Hoglah,<s%> <S%H4435>Milcah,<s%> and <S%H8656>Tirzah.<s%>

And they came <S%H7126>near<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H5126>Nun,<s%> and <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H5387>princes,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> The <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> us an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> our <S%H251>brethren.<s%> Therefore <S%H413>according<s%> to the <S%H6310>commandment<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> he <S%H5414>gave<s%> them an <S%H5159>inheritance<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H251>brethren<s%> of their <S%H1>father.<s%>

And there <S%H5307>fell<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H2256>portions<s%> to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H905>beside<s%> the <S%H4480>land<s%> <S%H776><s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead<s%> and <S%H1316>Bashan,<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> were on the other <S%H5676>side<s%> <S%H3383>Jordan;<s%>

Because <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> had an <S%H5157>inheritance<s%> <S%H5159><s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> his <S%H1121>sons:<s%> and the <S%H3498>rest<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh's<s%> <S%H1121>sons<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H1568>Gilead.<s%>

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1961>was<s%> from <S%H4480>Asher<s%> <S%H836><s%> to <S%H4366>Michmethah,<s%> <S%H834>that<s%> lieth <S%H5921>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> <S%H7927>Shechem;<s%> and the <S%H1366>border<s%> went <S%H1980>along<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the right <S%H3225>hand<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5887>En-tappuah.<s%>

Now <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H8599>Tappuah:<s%> but <S%H8599>Tappuah<s%> <S%H413>on<s%> the <S%H1366>border<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> belonged to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim;<s%>

And the <S%H1366>coast<s%> <S%H3381>descended<s%> unto the <S%H5158>river<s%> <S%H7071>Kanah,<s%> <S%H5045>southward<s%> of the <S%H5158>river:<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> are <S%H8432>among<s%> the <S%H5892>cities<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh:<s%> the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> also was on the north <S%H4480>side<s%> <S%H6828><s%> of the <S%H5158>river,<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of it <S%H1961>were<s%> at the sea: <S%H3220><s%>

Southward <S%H5045><s%> it was <S%H669>Ephraim's,<s%> and <S%H6828>northward<s%> it was <S%H4519>Manasseh's,<s%> and the <S%H3220>sea<s%> <S%H1961>is<s%> his <S%H1366>border;<s%> and they met <S%H6293>together<s%> in <S%H836>Asher<s%> on the <S%H4480>north,<s%> <S%H6828><s%> and in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> on the <S%H4480>east.<s%> <S%H4217><s%>

And <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> in <S%H3485>Issachar<s%> and in <S%H836>Asher<s%> <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and <S%H2991>Ibleam<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H1756>Dor<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H5874>Endor<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H8590>Taanach<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and the <S%H3427>inhabitants<s%> of <S%H4023>Megiddo<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> even <S%H7969>three<s%> <S%H5316>countries.<s%>

Yet the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H4519>Manasseh<s%> <S%H3201>could<s%> <S%H3808>not<s%> drive <S%H3423>out<s%> the inhabitants <S%H853>of<s%> <S%H428>those<s%> <S%H5892>cities;<s%> but the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> <S%H2974>would<s%> <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H2088>that<s%> <S%H776>land.<s%>

Yet it came to <S%H1961>pass,<s%> <S%H3588>when<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> were waxen <S%H2388>strong,<s%> that they <S%H5414>put<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> to <S%H4522>tribute;<s%> but did <S%H3808>not<s%> utterly drive them <S%H3423>out.<s%> <S%H3423><s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> <S%H854>unto<s%> <S%H853><s%> <S%H3091>Joshua,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H4069>Why<s%> hast thou <S%H5414>given<s%> me but <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> and <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H2256>portion<s%> to <S%H5159>inherit,<s%> seeing <S%H589>I<s%> am a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> <S%H5704>forasmuch<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> hath <S%H1288>blessed<s%> me <S%H834>hitherto?<s%> <S%H5704><s%> <S%H3541><s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>answered<s%> <S%H413><s%> them, <S%H518>If<s%> <S%H859>thou<s%> be a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> then get thee <S%H5927>up<s%> to the <S%H3293>wood<s%> country, and cut <S%H1254>down<s%> for thyself <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6522>Perizzites<s%> and of the <S%H7497>giants,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> be too <S%H213>narrow<s%> for thee.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> The <S%H2022>hill<s%> is <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H4672>enough<s%> for us: and <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites<s%> that <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in the <S%H776>land<s%> of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> have <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H1270>iron,<s%> both they <S%H834>who<s%> are of <S%H1052>Beth-shean<s%> and her <S%H1323>towns,<s%> and they <S%H834>who<s%> are of the <S%H6010>valley<s%> of <S%H3157>Jezreel.<s%>

And <S%H3091>Joshua<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> <S%H413>unto<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3130>Joseph,<s%> even to <S%H669>Ephraim<s%> and to <S%H4519>Manasseh,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H859>Thou<s%> art a <S%H7227>great<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and hast <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H3581>power:<s%> thou shalt <S%H3808>not<s%> <S%H1961>have<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1486>lot<s%> only:

But <S%H3588><s%> the <S%H2022>mountain<s%> shall <S%H1961>be<s%> thine; <S%H3588>for<s%> <S%H1931>it<s%> is a <S%H3293>wood,<s%> and thou shalt cut it <S%H1254>down:<s%> and the <S%H8444>outgoings<s%> of it shall <S%H1931>be<s%> thine: <S%H3588>for<s%> thou shalt drive <S%H3423>out<s%> <S%H853><s%> the <S%H3669>Canaanites,<s%> <S%H3588>though<s%> they have <S%H1270>iron<s%> <S%H7393>chariots,<s%> and <S%H3588>though<s%> <S%H1931>they<s%> be <S%H2389>strong.<s%>
